name: erotically
content:

in a way that relates to sexual desire and pleasure: She dances erotically. an erotically alluring young couple See
erotic
More examplesFewer examplesNo one would publish her erotically charged works.Her response to her critics was to dance even more erotically.The style of his singing is erotically stirring. The models are erotically posed.
